class.name: RealArray
class.description: Real Array. Array of floating point values. Can only contain floats. Optimized for memory usage, can't fragment the memory.

method.name: append
method.description: Append an element at the end of the array (alias of [method push_back]).

method.name: append_array
method.description: Append an [RealArray] at the end of this array.

method.name: insert
method.description: Insert a new element at a given position in the array. The position must be valid, or at the end of the array (pos==size()).

method.name: invert
method.description: Reverse the order of the elements in the array (so first element will now be the last).

method.name: push_back
method.description: Append an element at the end of the array.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove an element from the array by index.

method.name: resize
method.description: Set the size of the [RealArray]. If larger than the current size it will reserve some space beforehand, and if it is smaller it will cut off the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Change the float at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Return the size of the array.
